## DynamicFormStore class

Exposes form state to all components in the dynamic form provider scope. Can be used by question components to access neccesary form state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DynamicFormStore<TFormState extends {}> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformstore._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DynamicFormStore</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [formState](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformstore.formstate.md) |  | Maybe&lt;TFormState&gt; |  |
|  [formState$](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformstore.formstate_.md) |  | Observable&lt;Maybe&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt; | An observable of the formState |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getOptions$(getter)](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformstore.getoptions_.md) |  | Get options stored in formState with the provided getter. |
|  [setFormState(formState)](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformstore.setformstate.md) |  | Set the form state causing the formState observer to emit |
